website_summaries.verdict: Classic women's shoes in Reebok's inimitable style with the budget price.
pros: A good start for women who want to purchase inexpensive athletic shoes
cons: Get a size up, as sizes can be tight

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable on hard floors. Order wide.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable to be on your feet all day. Order wide if you have average width feet. These run narrow. Wear these as a surgical tech.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Comfy...slightly smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute & well made. They definitely have the 'classic Reebok' look about them. They're nice & comfy, too. The pale pink color is accurate to the description & it's just want I wanted. I rated it 4 stars instead of 5 because the shoes are just a little tight. I don't think I can wear even thin socks with them. I wear a size 5 and normally, it fits perfectly in 99% of the shoes I buy. This one is just a little tight, not sure it's even a half size smaller than normal. It might stretch out over time.
customer_reviews.author: Faedorah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wide width in this style now fits like regular
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable. I've worn Reebok Princess style for years in regular/medium width. I had noticed the pair I bought 2-3 years ago were tight so after reading other reviews, I found that everyone was having the same issue. I bought this pair on Amazon in my size but wide width and they fit perfectly, just like the regular width used to. This is the only shoe I need the wide width, so the brand/style has changed.
customer_reviews.author: JB53

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Durable. Great arch support.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been my "go to" shoes for years. As a Registered Nurse working in Labor & Delivery, I could be on my feet for hours. This style of Reebok were the shoes I always relied on. Though I chose the white shoes when I worked, I knew that I could take these out of the box, put them on and work a 12 hour shift with no blisters or "breaking in" problems. They are comfortable from the time you put them on. They also have great arch support and are very durable. Even in retirement, I wear these tennies almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Yay!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and looks good!! Thank you I'm satisfied. Update: The material especially shoe tongue gets dirty so easily even if you are taking care of it! annoying to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Alaa Allaf

customer_reviews.title: New Wide Same As Old Regular Width, Still Comfortable and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: The wide width fit almost the same as my 30 year old regular width Princess shoes. A tiny bit shorter which is okay. My old pair were always a bit long. These are the only tennis shoes I'll wear so I'm thrilled they are still available. They are so comfortable and feminine. Don't make your feet look big like those other clunky styles they have these days. Great price for my favorite shoes. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: DRM-TX

customer_reviews.title: You feel the relief instantly
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Plantar fasciitis had me to the point that I could not walk. Followed my doctors orders for rest, ice, and exercises but nothing worked, including the other brand of shoe inserts I purchased. And as you can see on the pictures that arch omg feels so good! I have it on my for 5 minutes and I instantly feel the relief! I have been wearing them for several days now and they are absolutely remarkable in supporting my arch as well as with the plantar fasci. You cant go wrong buying these soles.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: ... a pair of brand x from Walmart that fit better then these do
customer_reviews.text: I could have bought a pair of brand x from Walmart that fit better then these do. They are NOT wide even though they claim they are. I even question if they are real Reebok since I have Reebok sneakers that I was going to replace with these. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY THESE SNEAKERS ARE HORRIBLE! Donating them a neighbor who needs sneakers so badly she will take anything since hers are falling apart. I guess in that case these are better then nothing. If I could have given them a rating in the negative numbers I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these inserts
customer_reviews.text: Plantar Fasciitis pain was getting pretty bad, so I bought these insoles looking for some relief. I love these inserts and they are much better than other inserts. Price is ok, very good support on arch, after a few days worn them at work, the arch seems good fit now, but I guess everything need to break in, and after will feel more comfortable, now I love them so much that I don't like to wear my work boots without them.
customer_reviews.author: Hermina Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I don't come close to the weight they show in their advert but these insoles provide really great support and have really helped the plantar fascitiis that was making my left foot more and more useless. If you need support and have high arches as I do you really should give these a try no matter what you weigh.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Pardo

customer_reviews.title: Rich and bright, it's outta sight!
customer_reviews.text: I am a hard core shoe lover! I also have back issues and these have enough support without me needing to wear my inserts! I get so many compliments because the red is so rich and bright!
customer_reviews.author: The best things according to me

customer_reviews.title: Love the Princess Reebok Classic
customer_reviews.text: I love these tennis shoes. i've been wearing them for decades! I highly recommend them. They are comfortable, altho the pair I got last year, not from Amazon, had this new memory foam insert in them making them super comfy. These do not have that..... they are the older/original version. But still a comfortable shoe. I wear for every day wear. I am not a runner, jogger or exerciser. So I cannot comment on that aspect of the shoe. But I do want to say they run narrow. I have an average foot. Always have worn Regular shoes, but in this I always get the wide. 6 Wide fits me just like 6 regular in other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi P.

customer_reviews.title: Not Leather!!
customer_reviews.text: Run small in width, length ok. The original version was soft leather, not synthetic. They still look the same but comfort is not great due to synthetic material, its is hard). Reebok, please go back & make these real leather!! Love the style!! Will exchange for wider size and hope Reebok will make them again in leather? The price is good but would pay more for leather. Some retailers charge $50.00 dollars for these. I would never pay that for these, not worth it.. Not sure I would buy them again??
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has been my favorite for long days of teaching school for many years. I was so disappointed they are no longer the same comfortable shoe. I thought I was imagining that they were smaller until I read the reviews. Apparently, I am not the only one disappointed. Thank you, Amazon for those reviews! Wish I would have read them before I bought this old favorite. They were much smaller and no longer leather. What a shame...Reebok is no longer a trusted name to me. I will now read the reviews before I buy an old standby order....things change and not for the better. Hope Reebok reads these reviews too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just not right..
customer_reviews.text: Guys, just don't. I'm a Mail Carrier and use them for work. I walk A LOT and of course these shoes eventually get worn down and I have to buy another. Which isn't my complaint. I've bought these from 3 different places. The first couple of pairs I bought from Macys were fine, but when I ordered a pair from amazon they were a completely different fit. The same size shoe fit too small. They smelled and looked not "right". Trust me and go to Reebok's website and order from there. It's really worth the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: NOT the classic!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in these shoes, and in myself for not reading the description more carefully. These are NOT the classic leather princess Reebok's from the 1990s. These are a cheap, vinyl lookalike! They run very tight and very small...no give, no breathing room. I've been wearing them hoping to stretch them out a bit, and no luck. These are heading to a charity shop!
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I returned them, stiff and ill fitting. I take an 8 and these were small without socks! I have had theses in the past and they were leather, these are synthetic, a really bad synthetic. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Gives Your Foot a Hug
customer_reviews.text: I have always especially liked this make and model of shoe. Great for everyday, aerobics (I was an instructor), or as a walking shoe. It is not available in most shoe stores, so when I needed a new tennis shoe, back in 2013, I found another brand that I wore that is very popular among women. It was nice, and I repurchased it a few times. But this time, I decided to seek out the Reebok Princess and I was happy to find it again on Amazon. Putting it on again was like coming home! Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfy sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for a graduation ceremony -- the school colors were red and black. They came with two sets of laces: red and black. No break-in period was needed with these; I wore them for 12 + hours the first time and had no issues. Very comfortable! Update: I took these on a week-long trip in which I was walking 10-15 miles each day in cities on hard surfaces. These shoes unfortunately did not remain comfortable through the trip. They became quite uncomfortable after 2 days. So overall I would say good for 1 day of walking/standing at a time, not multiple days in a row.
customer_reviews.author: C Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Although comgortable, after wearing them every day for a week the lining by the toe of the shoe started pilling up and tearing away. I had to reach inside and pull big pieces out so it wouldn't scratch my foot all day. I ended up throwing these shoes away.
customer_reviews.author: Killerella

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoe. Fortunately the size is close enough that they should fit very well after they are broke in. Generally, when I buy shoes, since my the right and left are slightly different in dimensions even though both are the same size, I have to try on several pairs of the same size and pick the best fit for each foot from the different pairs. They are very comfortable. I am going to order another pair, but I might order them wider.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SNEAKERS AND CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The exact red I wanted to match my Zumba Fitness ZWear! I got them a half size larger and I’m glad I did. Shoe fits perfectly. They look really good! This company is awesome! I had sent them a note when I ordered these that I needed to receive them ASAP cause I wanted to wear red for my gym reopening and my Group X Zumba class. This order was shipped THE SAME DAY!!! I received them in 2 days! I so recommend not only these sneakers but doing business with this company! They listen and they care! THEY ROCK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vegas

customer_reviews.title: I had this shoe before and knew how wonderful it was
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a shoe that you can work in and never get tired, this is the shoe. I had this shoe before and knew how wonderful it was! When they wore out after 10 years, I bought it again and was so happy and thrilled to have found the exact same shoe here at Amazon!!!! There is a reason why Reebok stays in business with no problems, shoes like this you know you can count on. When these shoes wear out, I will buy again and will be grateful to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Box does not accept exchanges.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Reebok shoes I bought at Pennies were so wonderfully comfortable. These over $40 shoes that I ordered on-line were too narrow for a regular width. I wanted to exchange them for a wider shoe, but was told I would have to return them and buy them again in another size. Why no even exchange? Does not make sense to me, so I bought other just as comfortable tennis shoes on Harriet Carter for $14.95!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good shock absorption and great support for flat feet!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has some issues with flat feet so I got these inserts for his shoes to hope relieve pain especially when hes walking on the treadmill. These shoes have a good amount of arch support and cushioning and I ordered his normal size 13 which fits true to size. I've gotten him insoles in the past and they were too rigid to be comfortable for him but these he can wear all day and get the support he needs! They have a deep heel cradle and provide good shock absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: These are such a classic style. I love that I can buy the same style I wore in the 80s and they still look fresh. I also love that they come in a wide width, as I find that the regular width is a little narrow. I usually wear a regular width, but I have a bunion, and the wide was perfect. I also find that they run about the same length as Nikes. I wear a 9.5 in street shoes, a 10 in Nike, and a 10 in these. The white is nice and bright and they are easy to keep clean by wiping them with a wet cloth.
customer_reviews.author: NOLA Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Something Changed
customer_reviews.text: I've probably bought 4-6 different pairs of this brand/style over the years but have been wearing a different brand for the past couple of years. I decided to go back to the "tried and true" Princess. I ordered the same wide size ladies' 9 I've always worn in this model. This pair, however, is tighter in the toebox. By the end of my 10-hour nursing shift, my toes are ACHING. The shoe looks the same inside and out as I remember, but something is different in the wide size toebox
customer_reviews.author: AZBkey

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Womwn's Princess shoes at Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was grateful to find these Reebok Women's Princess shoes at Amazon! After visiting many stores that usually carry Reebok I had given up on finding this shoe. This shoe fits really well, just like the pair I have to retire due to wear. The width, arch support and toe box fit exactly as the Reebok Princess shoes have for years. The black leather style is very useful during damp Texas winters. They are light in weight and easy to clean other factors that make this shoe a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: lizbeadbox

customer_reviews.title: Not the original. Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t the original shoe. They’re fake leather and make your feet sweat after a couple minutes. Going back. Odd company chose to cheap up these shoes. Original quality shoe, materials and fit would have a robust market at $100.00.
customer_reviews.author: G. B.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These Reebok sneakers are the most comfortable sneakers I have ever worn. I love the plain white, especially for summer. They are very smart looking as well. The Reebok name is on the side of the sneakers. I wear a size 5 1/2 wide which is difficult to find. I ordered these from Amazon three days ago and received them today. As soon as these sneakers arrived I took them out of the box and started wearing them. I still have them on my feet and am so delighted!
customer_reviews.author: NancyD

customer_reviews.title: fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic shoes! I have worn them for years, and the quality has not changed at all. They're supremely comfortable, and comfort is the key factor. I can get a whole year of daily, all-day wear from a pair of them, tho, admittedly, by the end of the 12th month they're looking pretty ratty and starting to come apart at the join of the upper and sole! But they're -still- comfortable! You won't be disappointed. mb PS. I've only bought the white ones. I did buy a pair of black and sent them back; they looked like "old lady sensible" shoes.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Buy them now!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes for 30 years. An Army podiatrist was treating me for bilateral heel spurs. He told me they would most likely grow back if I had the surgery to remove them. He cast my feet for 5 weeks and told me to wear THESE shoes. I have for 30 years. A few weeks ago I had to have my feet x-rayed. I read the radiologist's report and it said moderate to severe bone spurs. I never have any trouble with my feet! I Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy LaCock

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Right size, right color but a little plastic-y. The comments are right, these shoes have been decaying since I was a kid. I'm side 12, I was a Sasquatch since I was 12 years old so it was a nightmare for me to get nice girly shoes, and I was a teenager in the 80s so I saw everybody use rebook around me while I had to buy ugly shoes. And 30 years later I stumble across these size 12 Reebok and I don't hesitate. So these shoes are nice but they're not what they used to be. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi A.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and look dressy, but....
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in the fit with no arch support which is something my Reeboks in years gone by seemed to have. I am not able to return them as I went for a short walk outside to try them out. They are not really flexible and I ended up with aching and sore calf muscles and feet, so maybe this is just not the shoe for me. I have a normal arch and suffer from arthritis but my other shoes cause no problem. I thought I would like to go back to Reeboks and really loved the style and red colour.
customer_reviews.author: Skatergirlglo

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with fit
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes for years, always the same size, but for whatever reason, I decided to order a half size larger. What a mistake, these are so short and tight that I cannot wear them. I had taken them out the the box, threw the box away, before I tried them on (I know, pretty stupid). and tried to wear them. I lasted about one hour, had to go home to get my old pair. My thought is that these are seconds, not the quality shoe you would buy in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Overfield

customer_reviews.title: My every day shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I find that these sneakers are good for my feet. They are comfortable all day, though they do not have a lot of arch support. They do hold my ankles well. I would not run in them or even power walk, but they are comfortable for everyday and look good, I think, with pants, if you don’t have to wear dress shoes for work. I got a half size bigger to wear with thicker socks. A classic for me. I was glad to find them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Medine

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes EVER
customer_reviews.text: Re: arch support, they have very little arch support which is one reason that I love these shoes. I have rather flat feet and built in arch supports usually cause me pain. I have been wearing the Reebok Princess for over 20 years (I am 71) and they are comfortable right out of the box. When they get dirty, I pop them in a pillow case, tie it and wash them on cool. I let them air dry - takes about 3 days in the humid Florida climate, but they come out looking and feeling brand new. They are my favorite shoes and always will be!
customer_reviews.author: Jane R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Shoes don’t fit and I paid for shipping
customer_reviews.text: I needed these for a new job in a few days, so I checked the reviews and paid $13 and change for shipping. 3/4 said they fit as expected and I had a pair from several years ago. I ordered the size I needed. They arrived as paid for but do not fit. I love the shoes otherwise, but now do not have them for the new job. This is very disappointing. I can’t afford to order several sizes to make sure I get one that fits and return the rest. I am generally happy with non-clothing items ordered. This needs to be easier. How can you make this right, Amazon? Please refund my shipping cost as well, please.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: High-quality, well-made, great support!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice inserts, I bought them for a very specific pair of shoes that are great shoes but just didn’t have much support, plus they were a little big on me. I ordered a size larger than what I wear, and trimmed them to fit. It was easy to do. I have included a video for more information, these inserts are high-quality, well-made, and I solved my problem!
customer_reviews.author: Beatles Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: I am no stranger to reebok shoes and, like my other purchases , I am very happy with this purchase.This shoe is very white ( I hate when white looks like brown) and is well constructed with a thick sole. I can't stop coming back to these reebok shoes .The logo in the shoes tongue isn't so distracting so it should be aloud in a school where u are expected to wear only white shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah GTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: The Absolute BEST Athletic Shoe and Cute, Too!
customer_reviews.text: I started wearing these as a college cheerleader in the 80s and wore them as an NFL cheerleader. After all these years, the classic Reebok is still my absolute favorite athletic shoe! They are fashionable, the most comfortable, and they are the best (in my opinion) for dancing and Zumba. Love them!!! Also, loved the price!!! I also have these in two different colors of the high-top versions....love them all! Also, I can always wear these in an 8 1/2 medium, and they fit perfectly. I had no concerns about ordering them online because I knew they would fit, and I can't say that about other brands.
customer_reviews.author: K Craft

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! I wear the Princess design always as I volunteer at our local hospital. They are so comfortable, light on your feet while giving so much support! The best thing is that they now come in many colors! For a few decades the Princess was only available in white and later black. I had always kept one or two new pair in my closet just in case. Now I can order a new pair, for almost half the price and have them at my door in a days time!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe used to be my favorite go to until they stopped putting in arch supports. First I ordered my size in a regular width as that is what I have been wearing for years now. I have a very high instep and wide toe box. The toe box on the wide is okay but absolutely no arch support. The regular width was slightly to tight with an average sock. The Wide width is gaping from the arch half way to my heal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! BUT, wish they still made them with leather
customer_reviews.text: Got for my mom she is older and wants the original rebook she has worn sense Carter was president. She loves them. Said she can not find them in the store in San Antonio. They are no longer real leather but I am not telling her. I wish I could buy a real leather shoes we still eat beef why can't we use the leather? I guess it's political correctness to just discard the leather now. The American Indian was responsible and used everything from a buffalo. Why do we sport hunt if we don't eat the meat and why wast the leather and not use it for our shoes and other goods
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Way too tight, suggest sizing up
customer_reviews.text: I’m normally a 6 regular in shoes but these shoes are so tight and narrow that it starts to cut my circulation. Loosening the laces doesn’t really help. I couldn’t wear the shoes for more than a couple of hours as my feet started getting numb. I would suggest sizing up if you buy these. I would return but I already walked outside with them to see if the pain would lessen but it didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: The design is good and I can foresee myself wearing it very often ...
customer_reviews.text: My pair of shoes just arrived and thank god I ordered my normal size in wide. It fits snugly without socks on but I expect it to loosen a bit after being worn a few times. The design is good and I can foresee myself wearing it very often as it goes well with almost all outfits. Note: the exterior of the shoes is rather stiff, and your feet could get stuffy after wearing it for a prolonged period. Update: Breathability is bad. Other than that it is a pair of comfy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: crc

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CLASSIC
customer_reviews.text: I love the Reebok classic princess sneakers. They are so comfortable. I usually only get the white or black but I’m going to get some other colors this year. It is a wonderful sneaker for work, play or whatever. I would recommend them and the seller. They did a great job. The sneakers did not come in an oversized box which was excellent for me. Good experience
customer_reviews.author: Shopper59

customer_reviews.title: Too tight, laces were too short. A bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe gets too narrow by the toes, where my feet hurt because they didn't have enough room. I work in a hospital, so I am on my feet for hours, and they ached after a while. Also, the laces were too short so I had to buy longer ones so that I could tie my shoes without them untying.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M

customer_reviews.title: shoe arrived slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived as replacements for a worn-out pair of princess sneakers, and the new shoes were purchased at the sale price point of $25. This was a very good deal. Unfortunately, one of the shoes had three small grey scuffs on one side, and the back heel had a few broken threads. If Amazon had a good exchange policy (as opposed to a good return policy) then we would have exchanged it, but as it stands we'll just keep them. Given the defects, the shoes would have certainly been assigned to a clearance section in a normal store, and therefore cost about $25. So it feels like we got what we paid for, but not what we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: John M Meyer

customer_reviews.title: They Fit Again
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for years and then all of sudden every pair I tried was too tight and uncomfortable. I knew several other people who had the same problem. I'm not sure what they changed in the product design, but I was super frustrated and gave up on them for the last few years. Then I tried on a pair on a whim, and they actually fit again so they must have changed something back to the old style. I did have to buy the wide width, which I don't normally wear, but they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: Here it is about one year later and the shoe is falling apart. The toe area is separating from the sole. I bought these to replace another pair of Reebok sneakers that I had for over 5 years before the soles finally started to wear down to much. The difference I am aware of is my original shoe was made with leather and these new ones where not.
customer_reviews.author: Cheddar2000

customer_reviews.title: Feels like the change in fit is to cut back on ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the old Reebok at all! I’ve been biting black Reebok sneakers for years, but now I’ll have to buy a different brand. Too narrow, too tight! Feels like the change in fit is to cut back on materials... If I hadn’t worn them on a trip when they first arrived, I’d return them!
customer_reviews.author: cmt412

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. My "Princess" aerobic Reeboks date back to one week after Hurricane Katrina. I'm glad to find a new pair (and so is my husband). The fit is good; they are a bit on the narrow side which is what I wanted. The insoles are cotton absorbent, which is what I wanted. And they are comfortable for my morning walks. Good arch support. I could wear them all day long, really. The price was excellent. Shipping was almost before I got off the computer ordering them. Factory packaging was perfect. Excellent all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: MacNana

customer_reviews.title: Hreat but not for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: Not reccomend for people with flat foot, there is no support. Unfortunately i had to return .. they were stylish and cute but there was no way i would be comfortable in them .. i could have gotten arch supposrts but id rather have an all in one shoe already but thats just me . The material was nice and didnt have notacble flaws
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Noel

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Women's Princess Sneaker Size 6.5 W
customer_reviews.text: Glad I ordered the Wide width or the shoe would not have fit. It is still tight though but doesn't cause any pain. I normally wear a 6.5 regular depending on the make of the shoe, like boots I can wear a 7 just to be able to get it on! Wish they were the real leather but so far they are ok. I put some conditioner lotion for leather on them anyway before wearing them, due to one of the reviews saying they had cracked. No problems yet. Received them in two days without prime!
customer_reviews.author: cjsdemaria

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for walking and every day
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes, and I buy a pair every year. They don't have the glitz of a big-name marketing campaign, but they are the best shoes I've found for walking. I do a lot of walking, so that's important. They have pretty good arch support, and they look nice, too. Reebok shoes always fit me well, but I guess my toes got a little wider this year. Next time, I'll go up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa B. Dick

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Princess is TOO TIGHT/NARROW even in a WIDE width. Shoe was also shorter.
customer_reviews.text: Different from what I ordered. Completely wrong size. Is marked 8 1/2 Wide, but it is definitely a narrow. I own six other pairs of Reebok Princess in 8 1/2 Wide. These shoes are not only far more narrow -- they are even visibly shorter. This is a quality control issue. Incredibly disappointing, not to mention my beloved Reebok Princess shoes are not even leather any more. Extremely uncomfortable. Nothing like the Reebok Princess shoes from the past.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace my work shoes that were falling apart. I was completely blown away by this shoe. Probably one of the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned and considering the price they are more than worth it. There is absolutely no "breaking in" period, they were super comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have large feet, large and a normal wide width, not ridiculously wide, just wide.... These shoes run narrow, more narrow than can ever be comfortable. My feet hurt badly from these shoes. I am a waitress and we need white sneakers... I wish I had saved the money and never bought them. Terribly narrow. And I picked the 12w.... Never ever EVER again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My last order of these shoes in white were not what I expected, they seemed way to wide for my foot. The following order for these same shoes was in black and the fit was perfect. My most recent order, in white also fit perfectly. Have no idea why the first white pair I ordered were so wide on my foot, however wore them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very small...are they real Reeboks?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what’s wrong with these shoes, but they absolutely are not typical Reeboks. They look cheap, and they fit as if they’re made in Asia, in Asian sizes, very small in both width and length. If you’re going to buy them, buy a full size up. But I’m returning and getting real Reeboks elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wore these Reebok princess shoes for years working on a concrete floor. I am now retired. I decided to get a pair for a trip that would involve a lot of walking. The soft upper leather of the shoe was comfortable on my big toe that has a bunion on it. Comfortable on the heel of the foot but going forward to the ball of the foot it felt too flat. It needs more padding in that area. I do not know if my feet have changed or you have changed the sole of the shoe. Upper portion is very comfortable. Need to redesign the sole where the ball of foot is concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Scmeemaw

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended!
customer_reviews.text: More than 20 years wearing these bad boys! LOVE IT eternally! Ok, they were made in original leather first... But the synthetic is good too. If you want some more "learher look", just pass some soe polish and voila... Looks like the "old" leather reebok . Loooooove ot soooooo much! A classic style!
customer_reviews.author: Vickka

customer_reviews.title: Fits great right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes before. Just like my previous ones, these fit great right out of the box. You don't have to break them in. The heel cushioning is even more important to me now that I have tendonitis in my right heel. Though I miss the real leather tops, I still love these shoes. I hope Reebock never stops making them.
customer_reviews.author: Bookarian

customer_reviews.title: Not like before
customer_reviews.text: I ordered theses same shoes 6 or so months ago and they fit like a dream. Ordered this pair and they are extremely tight. Also they have a different logo so I'm wondering if they have someone new manufacturing them. I guess I'm back to looking for a shoe with a wide toe box and adjustable heel.
customer_reviews.author: GetHitchedKwik

customer_reviews.title: I bought 10W like I did before...these are smaller
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same size I did before... and they were 1/2" shorter and narrower. I thought I got the wrong size before perhaps... but they and the new ones said 10W. These were like a regular 9.5 Returned. I may risk ordering in 11W ... but will look locally first to be able to try on.
customer_reviews.author: IDN

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy Reebok again until they sell 99% fit
customer_reviews.text: Love Reebok but they run small. Went with sketchers. They offered more stability for my foot!! Reebok felt like my foot was going to tip over! They did not fit well at all. I tried two different sizes. One larger than the other. Returned both. Now UPS has no record of return!! OMG!! Help!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Gin

customer_reviews.title: Look grea, feel great
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, have worn them for years. I have a bad foot and they are so comfortable and are wide enough not to crunch your foot but not so wide your foot slides around. Hole up great. I just spray them with a cleaner like Simple Green, wipe them of and they are like new. They hold up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Grider

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loveee these shoes. I have the hardest time finding shoes bc my feet are extra wide and most normal wide shoes still dont fit. I have poor circulation and my feet swell up. My left foot more than the other so making it that more difficult to find shoes that actually fit and that even comfortable. Im buying a 2nd pair asap! Ps. The swelling in my feet have gone down and my posture is even better. Im so glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: So Much Smaller Now
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these all the time. I figured I would try again. I ordered my standard size. They have definitely changed their sizing. I ordered a 9W. I could barely get these on my feet. I have some new shoes at the same size and they fit perfectly. Not ordering shoes online again.
customer_reviews.author: MsChristineH

customer_reviews.title: Not Like They Used to Be
customer_reviews.text: When my old Reebok Princesses got so worn that my toe was peeking through, I finally decided to get some new ones. I've been wearing this shoe for years and have probably gone through four or five pairs to date. When I ordered new ones, I expected to get the same shoe I've been wearing for years, but that's not what I ended up with. There is virtually no arch support in the new Princess, and the difference in comfort is noticable -- and not in a good way. I'm very disappointed that this favorite old standby is no longer up to its former standards.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Great for my day-to-day activities
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Reebok Princess shoes for years now, so I was sure of my size when ordering. That said, these seem a little narrower than they've been in the past, but are still comfortable. Also, the listing on Amazon says these are leather--but they are vinyl. I'm sure they won't last as long as the leather ones I've worn in the past, but the price is good. I like these because they are comfortable all day, and they look nicer than all the garish neon-colored athletic shoes on the market today. I'm not wearing them for running or exercise classes, and they provide the comfort I need for day-to-day activities without looking "clunky".
customer_reviews.author: Judy B. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for long walks
customer_reviews.text: Having read some bad reviews about the fit and quality, I was concerned but decided to take a chance as I've had this brand before and always loved them. These shoes were perfect from the moment I put them on, soft and no blistering. I was a bit concerned that there is no arch support but it hasn't bothered me. I walk 2 to 3 miles every day. These shoes are just right.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected but oksy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I thought they would be like the pair I bought long ago that had a high arch support which helped my planter fasciitis. These do not have much arch support. My old ones seemed to be made of leather and these are synthetic. They are a decent pair of shoes, though, and I will wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The toe is so tight that it hurts.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these shoe before and haven't had an issue, which is why I went ahead and bought them through Amazon. Big mistake. The toe is painfully narrow, At first I thought I'd received the wrong size, so I checked the tag. Nope, they were the correct size. I then thought maybe I need to break them in a bit, so I've been walking around in them. They haven't budged and now I've worn them enough that I can't return them, so I'm out the money I paid. And now I have to go buy shoes again - at a bricks & mortar store, NOT ONLINE. I won't buy Reeboks again, and I won't order shoes online again, either.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE SHOE, BUT BEWARE OF SIZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 8th or 10th pair of these. I love them because they are so light weight. Perfect for the gym. I started wearing them years ago because there is no seaming in the toe box. I always get a half size larger as they run small. I ordered a Medium and was at first annoyed that I received a size Wide. There is absolutely NO DIFFERENCE in the medium and wide. If you truly need a wide width, this is probably not the shoe for you!
customer_reviews.author: goldenlover

customer_reviews.title: The Best Reebok Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Reebok tennis shoe they ever made. I have been wearing them for over 30 years..... They are hard to find in some stores . They last forever. I love them so much that I have 3 pairs in back up........including the high tops that they no longer make. The support is great and the leather is so soft. You can walk, on vacation, the entire day and never feel it in your feet. Easy to clean with a Mr Clean Eraser and a little soap.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable For Me While Exercising
customer_reviews.text: I do 4-5 miles a day, and even though I’ve tried a lot of shoes, I keep coming back to this one. The only thing I’ve finally learned is that (although my shoe size is an 8) hard walking pushes my feet forward, and an 8 1/2 is more comfortable on my toes even though it’s a little long for normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Brinson Descendant

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Reebok girl. I used to wear these in college and they sadly went out of style. When the classic styles came back I was all over it. I ordered them for my trip to New York City as I knew there would be a ton of walking. They were so comfortable and I clocked over 45 miles in these kicks. No blisters or sore feet. I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Heather M Barnes

customer_reviews.title: better for my feet than wearing cheap Crocs everyday
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for these for years but couldn't find in stores. Finally found 'em on line. Thank goodness. I wore my old ones of this style to death. Even though they do not come in wides (although I REALLY wish they did, Reebock!) they are soft enough to stretch to fit. Unfortunately this means they will wear out fast. But hey, better for my feet than wearing cheap Crocs everyday. Maybe I should buy another pair while I can?
customer_reviews.author: Banruadh

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandmother who usually keeps her sneakers (these exact ones) for a few years and these have fallen apart 3.5 months later. I’m hoping the seller will offer me a refund or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace old Reeboks that are really worn. These shoes looked the same but nowhere near the quality of my old ones. They were way too tight even though I selected same size as my old shoes. There is no arch support I'm sending back and afraid that any other Reeboks I try will be as bad. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie A.

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Womens Princess Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I can't buy this locally anywhere, anymore, and ordered from Amazon. The 7.5 Medium was just a little tight and small, but that should not be reflected on Amazon or Reebok, I guessed and ordered the wrong size, so I am to blame : ) Amazon was excellent with exchanging them for the right size and I'm completely satisfied! So no problems what so ever : ) I've been wearing the Reebok Princess (and the good old Classic, thought they don't make them anymore) since I was a teenager and well beyond my teenage years now, LOL, but these are like Gold. : ) I would highly recommend these to anyone, they are the BEST! : )
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first pair and exchange it for one size larger. All my shoes and sneakers are the same size but these sneakers run small. Other than that the quality seems ok but will be able to tell more after wearing them for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia T.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: They fit absolutely perfect. I’m on my way to my first day at work and I’m absolutely stunned. A lot of reviews were saying that the shoes were fake for that they’re not real, the only thing I can say to that effect is that I think they’re real because there’s all the information on the tongue, however there is no information on the insole. However this is all still very comfortable so I’m perfectly happy with my purchase recommend to family or friends
customer_reviews.author: Heather Paden

customer_reviews.title: I have worn these for years!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Reebox for years, probably over 10. I have very high arches and these are the best sneakers I have found. I was extremely disappointed when stores quit carrying them. I am SO-O-O happy to have found them on Amazon. Thank you so much. I usually buy the Classic but if one of the other Reebox sneakers have a high arch, please let me know!
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this particular shoe for quite a while and when I found it on Amazon looking because my old pair was about done, I had to get them. Good price, fit as expected, and as always the shipping on time and when it said it would be delivered. These are cute shoes and they look cute with jeans or shorts. I am so glad I found them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ease of finding product
customer_reviews.text: Went to many different places trying to locate where they would have this sneaker. My mother-in-law bought these sneakers 10 years ago so you know the sneaker is well made! She is 97 and would not consider any other sneaker. Seeing the look of despair on her sweet eyes made me think of Amazon. Within 1 minute i was able to find the exact sneaker in her size and had it delivered to her door in 2 days. She was happy and enjoyed getting a package delivered to her door! I LOVE AMAZON!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Kennefick

customer_reviews.title: regret
customer_reviews.text: Wanted these shoes for both my Mom and I so tried one pair for us both to try on. Shoes were way too small for the stated size, some might be the style so order up. Also it seemed cheaply made for the brand. Returns were super easy though so may try a different style later.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and Reasonably Priced Inserts
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these for the past few days and they seem to help my plantar fasciitis. At first, it seemed odd to walk in them and they have a higher arch than I am used to wearing, but overall they are comfortable. I would recommend them if you are having problems with plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: The arch support is gone thus making the shoe less comfortable. I bought and wore these shoes everyday for ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes used to be leather. In fact when I ordered them, the description said the shoes were leather. Now, they are made with a manmade material. The arch support is gone thus making the shoe less comfortable. I bought and wore these shoes everyday for over 35 years. Now, I don't know if I will purchase them in the future. Many of my friends feel the same way. Now, I have the unpleasant task of finding a new brand that will fit my foot as well as the old Reboc shoes. Why mess with a good thing? We are not happy. Reboc should be ashamed of themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, this product has changed my life.I have always been flat footed and I am a healthy young man, so people have never understood why I walk so slowly.Recently, the pain spread from my ankle to my knee and I was very depressed.These inserts completely solved all the pain in my knee and ankle.I would recommend someone like me to try this foot pad.
customer_reviews.author: Norton Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great for narrow feet!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Reebok Princess sneakers. I have narrow feet as this style hugs my feet perfectly. I'm not a fan of white or black sneeaks, but these came in techie red and I was thrilled. Now if I could get a pair in turquoise too, I'd be beaucoup happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Lady

customer_reviews.title: Returned- not flattering and didn’t seem Genuine Reeboks
customer_reviews.text: Returned these. I’ve worn Reebok’s for 40 years and these are either fake or Reebok has changed. The length was fine but there seemed to be so much extra leather around the toes and side. The shoe just bunches up when I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box & wide width options too!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can get wide widths in these still. Stores don't carry them. I have a problem getting comfortable shoes and know right away when I put them on in store, pretty much everything hurts right away. These went straight out of the box, orthotics put in, and used all day in a volunteer position that required much standing and walking and my feet felt great all day as if I had these forever. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Above Rubies Mom

customer_reviews.title: Are these really Reeboks?
customer_reviews.text: Like a few others, this seems like a cheap version of the Reebok I have worn for years...this exact style. It is tight, and I am a firm 6.5 medium when it comes to shoes. My other Reeboks were 6.5 M, and the fact it is made in Viet Nam tells me it might be a knock off. I plan to go to Penney's and see where the Reeboks they sell are made. They don't fit at all the same as those I bought at Penney's for so many years. No arch support at all!
customer_reviews.author: M. K. O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: I Like
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to find Reeboks for women in stores where other athletic shoes are sold. I finally got smart, after all these year, and went online....et voila....Reeboks were found and ordered. It has been many years and although I perhaps should have gotten my size in wide, they are still slipper-like comfortable and I feel no special need to return them for a greater width. I love the Princess style and am glad to have found it again!
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Grippe

customer_reviews.title: A Good Bang For Your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear medium but the reviews advised me to by a wide. While they are a little wider than I'm used to, I can see a medium would have been too narrow so I'm glad I got a wide. They have minimal arch support but nothing inside the shoe is rubbing my feet the wrong way:) For the price, they are more comfortable for shoes I've paid twice the amount and they are dainty and pretty to look at once you get past the "they look like nurses shoes" so I'm telling people I'm a nurse..., more than one way to skin a cat. For the most part, I like them and they are a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Angela J. Zito

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a bartender. I always wore the black hightops while working. I could go all night with those. I needed a shoe that was comfortable and not bulky like a running shoe. I remembered these and how well the leather conforms to your foot. I took a shot ordering online because I have a hard time fitting shoes. These shoes are the same as they were when they first came out years ago and were so popular. This is my second pair ordering online and they are a perfect fit. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this particular shoe for many years. I just keep ordering the same style and size ;) It is important to know to expect them to come a little snug at first, but they will "give" as you wear them. Always comfy, always look good.
customer_reviews.author: D Johnson

product_meta.title: Reebok Women's Princess Sneaker
product_meta.description:
Between cushion and timeless style, let this women's shoe cast its spell over you. You'll fall hard for the clean upper design with subtle perforations and stitching. The Union Jack symbol sits right below the laces for heritage style.

Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, Joseph William Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, J.W. Foster and Sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
feature_bullets: DURABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT MATERIAL: These princess sneakers feature a synthetic leather upper for soft support and comfort
EFFICIENT FOOT SUPPORT: These stylish trainers have a die-cut EVA midsole which lasts many strolls and jogs
STAY COOL AND DRY: This footwear features soft terry lining which absorbs moisture keeping you cool and dry
COMFORTABLE AND STURDY DESIGN: This Reebok footwear come with padded foam sockliner that provides lightweight cushioning which keeps you moving
HIGH-PERFORMANCE RUNNING SHOES: Ideal for long walks, running and hiking
